game_description: NOTICE: On January 31 2022, Splunk® VR will no longer be available as we've made the difficult decision to end this product. Thank you for your support along the way. If you have questions, please email us at splunk-vr@splunk.com. Splunk® VR gives your workflow an infinite canvas, frees your data exploration from limited monitor screens, and lets you display as much information as you want around you. Splunk VR transforms your environment into a data analysis canvas that you can control and manipulate in new ways. Use drilldowns in Splunk VR to tie related dashboards together and dive from high-level overviews to finer details in a few clicks. Take advantage of VR-only visualizations to view the flow of data between web servers or networks. Quickly understand the layout and connections between network nodes and identify the status of requests and events by looking at the volume and color of particles flowing between entities.
